title: Love on the wing
creator_credit: GPO Film Unit and Norman McLaren
brief_description: Continually metamorphosing symbols, drawn directly on 35mm film stock, move against multi-plane backgrounds. The film publicised the U.K. Air Mail service. Music by Jacques Ibert, camera by F. Gamagi.
